npcSpeech.text: You're awake! How are you feeling?

You don't remember! Wonderfuu... I mean what a shame. You must have blanked it all out... yes good... I mean a shame really but what can one do... Here, I have some food prepared for you. Don't be shy, eat up!

Glad to hear it child. You seem to be very lucid... I suppose it is too early but I have to ask you to honour our agreement. Please do not speak of what happened. It is much to ask but I am sure you understand the sensitive nature of the situation...
Wonderful! I always knew I could!

response.text: I will have to think about it.

npcSpeech.text: Hmmm... I hope that you make the right choice.
Alright. I am sure we will see each other soon.
Remember who your friends are. Agreed?
Alright. I am sure we will see each other soon.
I can't allow you to go like this.
